headline.main: BRAZIL TO COUNTER U-BOATS WITH PLANES; Editors Here on Way to London See Rise in Air-Mindedness

lead_paragraph: The Brazilian Government is concentrating on the development of its air force to counteract the submarine menace in that area, according to several newspaper editors and executives who are now here on their way to England to study the war program of the United Nations.
abstract: United Nations war program to be studied by Brazilian eds during London visit
